label.authorities_desc: اختر مصدر الرعاية الصحية الموثوقة في منطقتك للحصول على بيانات التعرض و الانتشار. حدد إما اسمًا من السجل العام ، أو أدخل عنوان الويب الذي قدمته السلطة
label.authorities_removal_alert_desc: هل أنت متأكد من أنك تريد إزالة مصدر بيانات هذه السلطة؟
label.choose_provider_subtitle: To be informed of exposures you will need to subscribe to a health authority.
label.commitment_para: Safe Paths securely records and checks your interaction with people using your location. Your data will NEVER leave your phone without your consent.
label.event_history_subtitle: Understand your personal exposure based on information shared by health authorities.
label.export_para_1: If you test positive for COVID-19, please do your part by sharing your location history with local authorities.
label.export_para_2: Location is shared as a simple list of times and places, no additional information.
label.home_at_risk_subsubtext: This does not mean you are infected.
label.home_at_risk_subtext: Based on your GPS history, it is possible you were in contact with or close to someone diagnosed with COVID19.
label.home_no_contact_subtext: استنادًا إلى البيانات المتاحة ، لم تكن بالقرب من أي شخص تم الإبلاغ عنه إيجابيًا بـ COVID-19
label.home_unknown_subtext: We can’t tell if you’re at risk unless you enable the app to access your location.
label.import_step_1: 1. Login to your Google Account and Download your Location History
label.import_step_2: 2. After downloaded, open this screen again. The data will import automatically.
label.launch_done_subheader:
أنت على استعداد لبدء التنفيذ.
 تذكر ، يمكنك دائمًا تحديث تفضيلاتك لاحقًا
label.launch_location_header: من اجل تذكر الاماكن الذي تذهب إليها ، يحتاج هاتفك إلى حفظ موقعك
label.launch_location_subheader: لا تقلق ، لا تترك المعلومات جهازك أبدًا ما لم تقرر المشاركة بها
label.launch_notif_header: تتيح لك الإشعارات معرفة ما إذا كنت قريب من شخص مصاب أم لا
label.launch_notif_subheader: لن نزعجك إلا لمشاركة التحديثات حول مخاطر التعرض المحتملة
label.launch_screen1_header: طريق العودة إلى الوضع الطبيعي يبدأ من هنا
label.launch_screen2_header: احصل على إشعار إذا قمت بالعبور بجانب شخص تم تشخيصه بـ COVID-19
label.launch_screen3_header: إذا كان اختبارك إيجابيًا، فيمكنك اختيار التبرع بياناتك بشكل مجهول
label.launch_screen3_subheader: مما يساعد على الحفاظ على مجتمعك بأكمله آمنًا
label.launch_screen4_header: أنت المسيطرة بالكامل. يتم حفظ البيانات فقط على هاتفك
label.launch_screen4_subheader: إذا كان الاختبار إيجابيًا ، انت فقط يمكنك اختيار المشاركة
label.location_disabled_message: COVID Safe Paths requires location services.
label.location_enabled_message: COVID Safe Paths is securely storing your GPS coordinates once every five minutes on this device.
label.maps_import_disclaimer: Safe Paths has no affiliation with Google and never shares your data.
label.maps_import_text: To see if you encountered someone with COVID-19 prior to downloading this app, you can import your personal location history.
label.nCoV2019_url_info: For more information on the dataset for this map
label.news_subtitle: Read about the latest COVID updates from your health authority and in general.
label.notification_warning_text: If a Healthcare Authority exists in your area you can subscribe to obtain regular updates of exposure risks.
label.notifications_exposure_format: {{daysAgo}} days ago you crossed paths someone infectious for {{exposureTime}} minutes.
label.notifications_exposure_format_today: Today you crossed paths with someone infectious for {{exposureTime}} minutes.
label.notifications_exposure_format_yesterday: Yesterday you crossed paths with someone infectious for {{exposureTime}} minutes.
label.notifications_no_exposure: No known exposures to COVID-19 during the last two weeks.
label.overlap_para_1:
The green trail represents your location history

The light purple circles represent the public dataset
label.push_at_risk_message: You have crossed paths with a COVID-19 patient
label.show_overlap: Click to view the public dataset
label.team_para: Our team is composed of a consortium of epidemiologists, engineers, data scientists, digital privacy evangelists, professors and researchers from reputable institutions, including: MIT, Harvard, The Mayo Clinic, TripleBlind, EyeNetra, Ernst & Young and Link Ventures.
label.tested_positive_subtitle: Your private data can be transferred to health authorities, backed up, or otherwise shared.

history.possible_exposure_para: It is possible you were in contact with or close to someone who tested positive for COVID-19
history.what_does_this_mean_para:
Based on your GPS history, it is possible that you may have been in contact with or close to somebody who was diagnosed with COVID19. This does not mean you are infected but that you might be.

For further information on what you should do you can refer to the Mayo Clinic’s website.
history.what_if_no_symptoms_para:
If you have no symptoms but still would like to be tested you can go to your nearest testing site.

Individuals who don't exhibit symptoms can sometimes still carrythe infection and infect others. Being careful about social distancing and coming in contact with large groups or at risk individuals (the elderly, those with significant other medical issues) is important to manage both your risk and the risk to others.
history.what_if_no_symptoms: What if I’m not showing symptoms?
